entry.title: RubyKaigi 2023 After Party sponsored by STORES
entry.content:
RubyKaigi 2023 After Party

We will be hosting an after-party for all RubyKaigi 2023 attendees. At the venue, there will be food and an all-you-can-drink beverage selection provided. Please enjoy networking and connecting with others who use or develop Ruby!

â€» This is the page for the RubyKaigi 2023 after-party. To register for RubyKaigi 2023, please sign up through the following registration page.

https://ti.to/rubykaigi/2023

Event Details

Date and Time: May 13th, 2023 (Saturday) 18:00 - 20:00 (Registration starts at 17:45)
Venue: Matsumoto Tsunagu Yokocho https://matsumoto-yokocho.jp/
Address: 1-3-21 Fukashi, Matsumoto City, Nagano Prefecture, 390-0815, Japan
Participation Fee: Free

Age Verification

While we welcome minors, weâ€™re instructed from the venue to do age verification in order to provide alcohol. Please make sure that you respond to the question asking youâ€™re at least 20 years old. Weâ€™ll provide minors a wristband to indicate who should not have alcoholic drinks.

For Ruby Committers, Speakers, Staff

Ruby core team members, RubyKaigi 2023 speakers and staff are invited to attend without registration! Just bring your Speaker/Committer/Staff badge to the party.

Important notes

  • The event is free to attend, but we kindly ask that you register in advance so that we can understand the number of participants.
  • If you are unable to attend, please take the time to cancel your registration.
  • We may compile and share details about the after-party in a blog post at a later date.
  • If your purpose for attending is deemed inappropriate, the event organizers reserve the right to cancel your participation.
  • Please act in accordance with the RubyKaigi Policies while inside the venue, and cooperate to ensure all participants can enjoy the event.
  • If you have any concerns or issues, please contact us through the "Inquiries about the Event" section on the event page.

RubyKaigi 2023 After Party

entry.title: Leaner Drinkup at RubyKaigi 2023
entry.content:
æ—¥æœ¬èªã®èª¬æ˜æ–‡ã¯è‹±èªã®ä¸‹ã«ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™

Overview

Leaner Technologies Inc. is a Ruby sponsor of RubyKaigi 2023.
In addition, we will be hosting a drink up after the second day of the event!

In addition to delicious food from American Diner, there will be plenty of sake selected by Sake Supervisor @joker1007!
Although limited, this is a great opportunity for RubyKaigi attendees to meet and mingle.

Venue

RK PARKS

2-6-1 Chuo, Matsumoto City, Nagano, Japan. About 7 minutes walk from RubyKaigi venue

What to bring

Please remember to bring your RubyKaigi 2023 nametag!
Some outdoor terrace seating is available, so a jacket is a good idea.

Registration Fee

Free!

Time Schedule

Time Contents
18:15 Reception Start
18:30 Cheers!
21:30 End time

Supervisor's Selection Sake List

Japanese only Please see the end of this page

Remarks.

In case of clear skies, the number of seats on the terrace is available and may be increased just before the date of the event.

Agileware's Drink Up event is back!
Located right next to the RubyKaigi venue, within the beautiful surroundings of Shinshi Shrine, it's the perfect location.

We also have 20 limited servings of vegan bento boxes available.

We focus on development through Agile and Ruby, continues to grow primarily through its in-house services.
Our strength lies in achieving 100% self-development within the company.
Our policy revolves around "individuals working freely according to their lifestyle." We have implemented various systems to enhance the work environment, including a three-day workweek (every other week), 150 annual holidays, a core-free full flex-time system, remote work options, casual dress code, and unlimited snacks and drinks. We strive to create a work-friendly environment that prioritizes employee satisfaction and convenience.
